name: SURFboard®HomeWi-FiManagement
0:
”Alexa, Ask Surfboard, to enable my guest network.”
”Alexa, Ask Surfboard to restart my gateway.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: surf board
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This Alexa skill enables users to manage and control select features on their SURFboard device with Alexa-powered voice commands (support may vary by product).
• Ability to reboot the SURFboard device in the home
• Ability enable the guest Wi-Fi network feature (if available)

Currently supported on: SURFboard mAX Pro, SURFboard mAX Plus (W30), SURFboard mAX (W21)

Know more: https://app.surfboardconnect.com/support/W21/help/AlexaAppSkillHelpPage.html
